_sText:
This is the fourth public release of my map!

**This update hopefully solves the Lag issue experienced on servers with more than 20 players.**

BETA 4 CHANGES:

- lag still needed to be fixed - this should do it for now
- some balancing on oilrig and in lab
- FPS and PING improvements
- Spawnpoints dont cause lag anymore
- fixed bug that let the alternative way disappear

It also contains various gameplay fixes and performance tweaks.

Escape from Hell! - Jump down the rocks and get to one of the graves
Pass the Bridge and the Gate of Death and defend the research lab
Get beamed up onto the surface and swim to the oilrig
Defend it and wait for the chopper 2 take u to the holy church!
Defend the 2nd Level of the church from the Zombies
and escape to the roof to survive the upcoming apocalypse!

This verison also contains some cool new textures I created
